title: Imported Portable Electronic Digital Hook Scale Hanging Scale Fishing Scale Luggage Bag Scale Digital Pocket Scale Digital Kitchen Scale Digital Weight Machine Weight Scale Digital Weighing Scale Weighing Machine Digital Mini Small Scale Weight Machine
description: This portable electronic scale is based on application-embedded micro-component core, featuring accurate weight, functional stable and digital LCD display.4 units selection oz,kg,lb,jin.Ideal for household use.It can be used while travelling to weigh your luggage.Automatic power-off function when not in use.Weighing accuracy and low power consumption.Measuring rang: 0-10Kg/5g, 10-50Kg/10g.Powered by 2 x AAA batteries (not included).Size : 11.5 x 5.8 x 2cm.
